title: Decked out Chicago Bears Chevy Avalanche LTZ Tailgating Truck with 46" Samsung TV
description:
The ultimate in tailgating!!  The Chevy Avalanche LTZ Tailgating Truck loaded with an Alpine 9 inch InDash system, Alpine pkgrse3dvd overhead monitor, and a 46 inch Samsung TV that folds up in the bed.  On top of the Avalanche is the TracVision satellite receiver to watch the game wherever you go.

Work done by mobile install at Abt Electronics. For more information about how you can get custom mobile work done at Abt Electronics call 847-967-8830.

 KVH TracVision Antenna 01027701BK - http://www.abt.com/product/27517/KVH-01027701BK.html

Wet Sounds Soundbar - http://www.abt.com/product/80670/Wet-Sounds-STEALTH10.html

Samsung 46” TV - http://www.abt.com/resources/pages/search.php?keywords=samsung+46+tv

Alpine In-Dash - http://www.abt.com/product/77580/Alpine-X009GM.html
